about_the_game:
This game is an ultra-high difficulty jigsaw puzzle where players embark on a challenging journey. Players must fit pieces into the correct positions to complete images generated randomly using colored tiles.

However, this game deviates significantly from traditional jigsaw puzzles. Placing a piece triggers several unexpected events. For example, with each piece placed, the colors gradually fade, increasing the difficulty for players to discern the image. Additionally, the workspace gradually shrinks, forcing players to work within tighter confines.

Moreover, placing a piece in the wrong position triggers an explosion, resetting the game from the beginning. Players must carefully select pieces and place them accurately.

Furthermore, players may encounter falling debris when placing pieces, obscuring their view and adding to the challenge.

This game serves as a test of players' concentration and strategic thinking, offering an extremely challenging puzzle experience. Can players accurately fit all the pieces and complete the puzzle?

name: Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: UHD Graphics 620

short_description: 'Ultimate Jigsaw Puzzle Challenge' is a puzzle game where you fill in 100 jigsaw pieces. Can you clear this monumental challenge? The time for the showdown has arrived.
